name: Night Mare House Escape Games
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------

'Wow! This Game Is Just Amazing! Excitement All The Way!'
'This Free Game Exceeded My Expectations! Download Now!'
'Downright Fun! My Kid Can't Stop Playing It!'
'I Love It When I Reach The Bottom And Catch The Bag Of Gold!'
---------------------------------------------------------------


Escape Nightmare House is a scary new point and click house escape game developed by the new Bamvd Games for an exciting escape attempt and an overall nightmare fun!

You just got yourself trapped in this house that has a stench of death! Well, that’s what you get from meddling too much at the nearby village, and now, you can’t get out.

The house seems pretty good alone but, the fact that there are creepy artifacts in here and the haunting rumors, makes this place notorious and eerie! Okay, you have to get out of here, that’s that! You must find something, anything, like a key or something. Just make sure you get out of here before more bad stuff happens. Good luck!


Escape nightmare house Games Story, Through the game you have heard stories of what has taken place there, but none of it has ever been confirmed. One day while driving to school your friends dare you to go inside. Escape your friends from this nightmare house.

Game features:

• Genuine story!
• Innovative puzzles!
• Stunning graphics!
• Realistic atmosphere!
• Tricky and challenging puzzles!
• Gorgeous graphics !
• No signup's required, just download and install!
